Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at DORMERO Hotel Königshof Dresden in Dresden (Strehlen), you'll be convenient to Grosser Garten and Albertinum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Dresden Zoo and Rudolf Harbig Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 93 air-conditioned rooms featuring free minibar items and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Grosser Garten - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Dresden Zoo - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Rudolf Harbig Stadium - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Saxon State Library - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Dresden Botanical Garden - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Dresden Park Railway - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Transparent Factory - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
German Hygiene Museum - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Dresden Panometer - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Russian Orthodox Church - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Dresden University of Technology - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Town Hall Tower - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
French Institute - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Dresden Racecourse - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Dresden City Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi

The preferred airport for DORMERO Hotel Königshof Dresden is Dresden (DRS) - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Dormero Hotel Königshof Dresden is Dresden (DRS-Dresden Airport) - 10.7 km / 6.7 mi.
